name: Oversized Battle Slimes
description:
Oversized Battle Slimes

A game about killing things, more specifically slimes. Created in the supreme game engine which is Scratch 

Shoot at slimes, Get guns from crates, Explode TNT and Buy Powerups 

One more thing, Don't Die.

Instuctions
  • WASD or Arrow Keys to move 
  • Click to shoot 
  • To open the shop click on the shop button, you must have cleared the stage to open the shop
  • Hover over and click on the gun to pick it up
